results.name: a(n) = 13^n modulo n.
link: Paul Tek, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) for(n=1, 50, print1(lift(Mod(13^n, n)), ", ")) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 28 2017
